attributes.action: release the technology/patent of Stan Ovshinsky for the electric car that does 300 miles at 70mph. This technology is currently being held by the oil companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An article in the independent 5/4/07 stated that oil companies currently hold vital information about electric cars. These cars are more economical, produce less emissions and are better for the environment. Since 1990 the oil companies have hid this information from the general public. We think the government should intervene in this case so that the electric car can be made.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
